reuters.title: FIRST MARATHON <FMS.A.TO> PLANS STOCK SPLIT
reuters.body: First Marathon Inc said it planned a two-for-one stock split, to be effective on shareholders' approval at the June 4 annual meeting. The financial services company said it also completed the previously reported 29.6 mln dlr private placement of 1.5 mln non-voting preferred shares convertible one-for-one into non-voting class A shares.
